name: Dungeon Escaping
description:
- This is my project for the course Unity 2d dungeon Gunner Roguelike Development by Rob Ager. 

- In this, I learned the power of scriptable objects in Unity and made it playable with a controller using the new input system.

- The game is better experienced in FULL SCREEN

Credits for the tutorial screen icons assets: https://dunny64.itch.io/1bit-controller

And for Rob Ager for the course and assets provided
